name: Hunt (itch)
description:
Armed with your torch and trusty crossbow, hunt down and kill the werewolf, before he does the same to you!

This work is an ongoing project, and available for free. Please donate and show your support, every last cent counts!

Show your support, and help me bring this game to it's full potential!

- UPDATE 3/18: Thanks for waiting, V2 is now released!
